title: XML-RPC API - Caveats
description:
1. Apache XML-RPC Client doesn't support HTTP-Digest authentication scheme when used with the default java.net.URLConnection http client classes. Much more feature-rich Jakarta HTTP Client should be used instead. 
  2. How to resolved issue in java xmlrpc client.
description_text:
Apache XML-RPC Client doesn't support HTTP-Digest authentication scheme when used with the default java.net.URLConnection http client classes. Much more feature-rich Jakarta HTTP Client should be used instead.  
 
How to resolved issue in java xmlrpc client.
